content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position(-5.0, -67.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -5.0, -67.0)

### Coal mining setup at position(42.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 42.0, -82.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Ensure to move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity. The maximum placement distance is 10 units.

### Errors when attempting to set recipe on a non-existent building
- Verify that the building is present and operational before trying to set its recipe.

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough resources in your inventory before attempting to place or insert items into entities.

### Errors when trying to insert items from an empty inventory
- Check your inventory to confirm that you have the required items before attempting to insert them into machines.

### Errors when encountering blocking entities
- Clear any blocking entities in the vicinity before placing new structures or attempting to perform actions that require space.

### Errors when trying to place entities without sufficient inventory items
- Make sure you have the necessary items in your inventory to craft or place the desired entity.
